attributes.additional_details: For the mental health of the nation. To be able to spend time with families.
attributes.background: Repeal the restrictions from 24th to 26th December to allow families to see each other and then reinstate restrictions.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reinstate the 5-day relaxation of COVID restrictions over Christmas: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564204

Allow families to have Christmas day together in all tiers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564312
